text: James Grubbs "Jim" Martin (born December 11, 1935) is an American politician. He served as the 70th Governor of the state of North Carolina. He served from 1985 to 1993. He was the second Republican elected to the office after Reconstruction, and the fifth overall. He is also the only Republican to serve two full terms as governor. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Academics from North Carolina Category:American chemists Category:Governors of North Carolina Category:People from Savannah, Georgia Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Princeton University alumni Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Scientists from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: James G. Martin
